6SZpIN9YORzlF6pt-QUrpQ.text: Love the homemade rolls they use for the sandwiches. Very clean.  I'll be back for pizza next time.

v8mK3HT_aIb9AIwL3cO8sQ.text: Definitely the best pizza I've had in the Charlotte area. Will be my go to pizza place. Small mom & pop place with good friendly service.

C1gg06Z9tuUeCAaxT3JpKg.text: Was in town visiting family and decided to try it out and was not disappointed.  Had a calzone and salad, very authentic. Very good pizzeria pizza and very good side items as well. It is very clean and very family oriented. Well be back to eat when near there.

irqG1hUG89TPeh2Zj7Fh5w.text: Found out about this place on Yelp tonight!! We didn't realize it was so close to us and absolutely loved it. We ordered an extra large pepperoni pizza and wings.  The wings were cooked perfectly.  We will definitely eat here again!   Very friendly staff as well!

Fd_jv4DcbNBWkh_HpCV7Sw.text: Delicious pizza! We were very happy to find good pizza and close to home. They also provide a Gluten Free pizza for those with an allergy or preference. The salads were large and impressive. Very casual dining. Great service.

WXjz8QZNvSNNaA8CgqSs2A.text: I can't say enough good things about this fine establishment. I and co workers have been here many times and every time the food has been great. The homemade sandwich bread is just awesome. Homemade pizza dough. Friendly staff. Do your self a favor and check out Papa Sammy's.

4u6quMPJ951U6bLwSWp6wA.text: Only downside to this place is that they do not deliver. I absolutely love pizza, with that said this is the best pizza I've had in a long time! Great customer service, great taste  and good prices. In fact as I'm writing this I just realized what I'm having for dinner tonight!

lyi4MpFUSQxfcKkC2GHWTg.text: Just picked up a pie & garlic knots to go after flying into CLT airport. Whole family loved the food. Great crust & sauce!! Friendly service & clean restrooms.

WXvshnF_NL2pTPV8IcyI0g.text: The food is excellent. The breads, pizza crust, spaghetti sauce and meatballs are homemade and delicious!!  Salads are so fresh and filling. Mama's desserts are to die for.  So much to love here.

LXqvDyVjMQJBQrYeesIlXg.text: We were in the area and getting hunger.  We used Yelp to see what was around us that could be good to eat and we found papa Sammy's.  The outside is just a normal older building but the inside has been remodeled nicely and it was very clean.  The people were polite and the food was awesome.  We ordered the white pizza with some pepperonis and it was super good.  The only down side is this place is about 45 minutes away from where we live.  If we are back in the area though we will be back.

cz19WhVwsJDNwkrj592CUA.text: Stopped in for lunch and had a Philly cheesesteak and my wife a chicken. Very good sandwiches. Place is spotless.  Highly recommended.  I have had there pizza before and it was good as well.  Keep up the good work.

sO0ZZ3g63tXaUTHT0p6_Sg.text: Great food and clean establishment! We love to order takeout, but they do have a dine in area. The pizza is great. The staff is very friendly and willing to make recommendations. The prices are very reasonable. Definitely a gem in Mount Holly!

uI5elstx8qPmcPCSRsC0Zw.text: We were looking for something close to our house to try that was new. The great thing about this place is 1. The price is good 2. Thin crust pizza if your from ny/nj this is major!! 3. The people are super friendly and really accommodating!! The food was great and it hit the spot! We will definitely be back!!

Nx8-O-9PaeSv8rmglYVyIw.text: Fantastic local pizza joint! Papa Sammy's homemade dough and bread seals the deal. Great staff! Will become one of our regulars.

40EbNkIk6D_SovlUlAB91w.text: Excellent pizza- friendly staff- great prices! Not a fancy restaurant- but a great place for calzones & pizza! Nothing like the chain restaurants!!!

skVn4WZyZLevhcKwsg0uWA.text: Love Pappy Sammy's.  Great pizza and sandwiches.  Johnny really likes the spaghetti.  Highly recommend!!!!

qvE4YvRA3f7g9scGHkDuYw.text: Great pizza, great garlic knots and great service. What a great find. So glad we tried it. We recommend you try it also. You won't be disappointed.  I thought they were going to have to roll me out. I could not stop eating. Three words: Awesome, Awesome, Awesome.

89d8kkGS5Hlrqeb5KScnWA.text: I was taking my grandchildren to Discover You, and we were looking for lunch nearby. Used Yelp to find Papa Sammy's and was very glad. The food was very good. My picky grandchildren finished their plates. The service was very nice and the price was reasonable. If nearby would definitely go again.

aORAnXfWBkV87uVfaKoqHw.text: Great New York style Pizza.   Friendly family owned restaurant.    Definitely worth the trip!

8R4fj2BjJaKkv8uQf_RyKQ.text: Our entire family loves Papa Sammy's! The pizza is always wonderful, generous toppings..always cooked exactly the way we want it. My daughter loves the salads and kid's menu and my teenage son would gobble up everything on the menu if we let him.

c2WmJufdjisY0fPl8UKYwg.text: My family of four was mixed from the very good to the okay.  We just ordered the basic cheese pizza for our first try.  Although we art not big fans of NY Style pizza, the sauce and cheese had a very good flavor.  We generally like a bit of a crunchier crust that is a bit less chewy.  Now if we could only find a local pizza place that offers Chicago style pizza.  It is good to see another restaurant opening in the year and we definitely like to support the local folks vs just another franchise.   We will definitely try the other menu options (very happy to finally have a place that offers gyros in the area).

uuh7RHls2QvBLC8fodyUwA.text: We love Papa Sammies Pizza and Greek Salad.  You can tell when a restaurant cares about the product they sale.  The ingredients are always fresh.  Their Greek Salad dressing is one of the best I have ever had.   My mouth waters thinking about a Papa Sammies Special!  YUM!

CHDsjyXtqJwtgU0ueEMA8Q.text: Love Papa Sammy's pizza!  Both take out and dine in are always enjoyable.  Tonight tried Door Dash to have the pizza delivered.  Service was awesome and pizza arrived on time and still hot.  Our favorite pizza joint and now delivery too!

SOZqkvt-RiNDH7O4FVZ7aQ.text: We've been here a couple of times and we love this place! Pizza is great, garlic knots are to die for and my husband loved the Alfredo pasta. We were very happy to find this place, great food and the staff is super friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

NGjjqQcG94OMtwdqXtmuEA.text: Love this place. The pizza is very authentic and the atmosphere is family friendly. The wings are as good as the pizza. I can't forget to rave about the garlic knots. So flavorful and fluffy.

eySX0VoBGRm1DkAMxfebEA.text: This is the best pizza in the Mount Holly/Belmont area hands-down. I have yet to try anything else, because it's so good. I love that I can order online from such a small, local place. I'll order right before I leave work and its ready by the time I get there! Can't beat that!

xUb-wCDCbsMPKTz4g6iWuA.text: We have lived in this area for 3 years and have been looking for a good pizza place. Tonight, we didn't just fine a good pizza place we found a phenomenal pizza place. While we considered adding other toppings, we settled on a simple pepperoni pie. That was one of the best pizzas we've had in a while. We will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States. Delicious!

-UxRm4S00i-rb5U8m2PJHg.text: The pizza is good but not great. Thought it would be better from the reviews. The toppings were very skimp and the mushrooms were cut so thin I could see through them. Probably like a total of half a mushroom on their largest pizza. We also had the fried ravioli which was pretty good. Might be better if I tried it again but not worth the drive with so many pizza places around. I could see if my choice was between DiMarcos, Dominos, and this place the it would be clear here though.

2cX7GtSx2QIRwT2U82gRfA.text: I'm from NY so I love some good pizza! This was probably the best I've had since moving to MT Holly in April. Yummy!

OO5HJQR37TKE5VW-djSnRg.text: Love ordering from here it's right down the road from my house so very convenient . the pizza is amazing!!  I'm addicted got plain cheese, pineapple and pepperoni and just pepperoni so far this is deff our go to place for now on.  and did I mention they are cleanest pizzeria I've ever been to. No complaints at all. They deserve 5 stars

photos.caption: Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States

DvPXbsEq9tGO1zJ2OtwDQw.text: Philly steak and cheese is my favorite!!! Very friendly staff, clean dining room!!! Great portion sizes.. my son loves the pizza!!

c7Ko2jBAjekKbAuxoYUqdw.text: Great pizza and garlic knots.  Grabbed a pie quickly after landing at CLT airport for the drive home.  So glad we did.  Great place.  Will be back again

wQd0ZyhPYXADS-Dg0s8odQ.text: Had the Italian sub and fries. Both were great. The pizza here is fantastic and could compete for best in area.

ULhAtGlfTlRm8qgihMbceg.text: Best food in Mount Holly!  His Pizza is several steps above with his own homemade sauce, dough, and real Italian Cheeses.  His salads are to die for!  Best Greek salad around.  His sandwiches come on his on his own baked bread!  You pay more for pizza here, but you get so much more!  Too good to be called Papa's Pizza...I call it Papa's Bistro!

photos.caption: Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States. Chicken Philly Cheese with fries that are the bomb!
Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States. Chicken Philly with their homemade bread!

qikQfCI7Hwbz_TSmgxiaSA.text: This is the best pizza we've ever had. It's our go to take out. Try the classic cheese pizza!

S3uflWmi_b07lDycBwHNQQ.text: This is the best pizza place in Gaston County and even Charlotte. We order weekly and it's always delicious. Philly Cheese Steak is great too!

oFlR8kIc1SQONUonatge3w.text: We found this place on Yelp and tried it on our way to Grandfather Mountain.  We were the only ones there for lunch, which was very surprising, as this place was awesome.  There were 4 of us and we all loved our pizza.  Papa Sammy was extremely nice and attentive, making sure we were all happy with our pizzas.  I would highly recommend this place and hope to get back some day.

c8L6hyPbWLUpuDjsWXk-iA.text: The pizza is pretty good, just a smudge overpriced. Nonetheless I would order from here again

gYzm8oRbTqhmJlxK7t0vow.text: Best pizza in the area! Good desserts also. Garlic knots are really good. Wish they delivered. Keep it up! We will be back multiple times.

ok5KBICQkSSkpBe3pXYjqQ.text: Great food! The pizza is really good, closest to NY style around here. Garlic knots, wings, mozz sticks are all really good! Bummer that they don't deliver anymore.

oIU099PTdSTWD4M_tRVAhg.text: This is the best pizza in the Charlotte area! I've only picked up pizza, but can't wait to dine in and try the other food since there are rave reviews for their other offerings. Small, family owned place with great food - my favorite kind of gem to find!

Tlm38EDptQBZLtwsoSTnCA.text: Typical diner, drive-in, dive kind of food. It's a bit greasy but hey some people like that, I know I do! People are friendly and service is quick.

V8c1064ux_OjvX1WuD-Hbg.text: We came here after a long day at the US Whitewater Training Center and it was amazing! The staff was amazing and the atmosphere is great. Highly recommend if you want great pizza and awesome service!

G4QHXl_fvf0oesnL8uQTzQ.text: I went to this place yesterday and done a food review, I must say I was pretty impressed! The staff was friendly and the food was very amazing the review will be posted to YouTube @ black_walter_ give it a subscribe if you'd like. long story short this place is definitely a hidden gem.

TtzPJfP6eF2dMYQoJQ4kvw.text: This was my second time eating Papa Sammy's Pizza. The first time was MUCH better than this visit. When we walked in, we noticed the restaurant was pretty busy. We went to the cash register and placed our order with the "help" of an annoyed teen staff member. The place was pretty old and gross but what else do you expect from a  local pizzeria. Regarding the wait time, it didn't impress. We waited an HOUR for a pizza and wings. When the food came, it was hot but lacking a lot of flavor. The sauce and cheese tasted pretty much like nothing. To add to this list of cons, the prices were very expensive. When I'm in the Mount Holly area, I think I'll stick to Marco's pizza.

photos.caption: Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States
Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States
Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States

_xfYBv4-vaK08s3y5egysA.text: Charlotte isn't the place for good food much less good pizza, but I think I've found one! It doesn't seem like much as you pull into their parking lot, but you'll be impressed with their pizza for sure!   It's a nice size restaurant with plenty of seating and games available at the tables. You pace your order at the register and they'll bring out your food. I went with a plain cheese pie to determine if indeed their pie is legit and boy was I pleased. A beautiful pie arrived to our table with a wonderful golden crust and white quality mozzarella cheese. The 14" Large is enough for two hungry people and you might have room for dessert which I didn't ask if they had any.   I would absolutely return to try other items on the menu such as spaghetti & meatballs, chicken parmigiana, calzones, burgers, Philly cheesesteaks etc..

H43NrkB9J_hW1G5rMRYlyA.text: I use to eat here often due to its a mom and pop shop and very personable  but i stopped eating her when i changed my diet and cut out pizza and pasta. They sell very tasty chicken salad but are Very expensive for the amount you get. I havebt been back in over a year from the outside the place looks abandoned so i didnt even know they were still in business.  I dont recommend their subs they are really small and u made still be hungry. Pizza sauce i didnt like very basic. Chicken wings pretty good thou.

8htOyYVzXI2LMeU4S5R_Gw.text: Sorry. Average at best. It's always a red flag when a restaurant tries to do more than they should. Wings and pizza okay, but adding burgers and other sandwiches and appetizers means they'll never be great at one thing. They should have just specialized in Italian food, pizza, or sandwiches. It's too typical of a small town. Anyway, we ordered a variety of things to see if anything stood out. Spaghetti and meatballs, watered down sauce out of a jar and frozen meatballs. Nothing homemade. Cheese pizza, overly chewy crust, too much sauce, not enough cheese. Dominoes quality at best. Meatball Sam-wich, meh. Same frozen meatballs in the spaghetti and too much crusty hard bread, but not terrible. Garlic knots, over cooked, chewy, and just dusted with garlic powder rather than fresh or chopped garlic, and barely any butter. Just dry. Finally, the Italian sandwich. This was probably the best. It was simple, but tasty and the lettuce was crisp, but not good enough to come back. I hate giving bad reviews to small family businesses. But with so much competition, the food must be outstanding. There's nothing at Papa Sammy's that I couldn't make at home.

fq4Q8ppJzsHgLStYEduVvw.text: Don't know what is going on with this place it used to be great.  Got the Philly steak sandwich and tasted like a taco really strong taco seasoning really????? On a Philly steak????

hj4ytqAU4bC31obljQGMsw.text: I don't know about the pizza but the subs and gyro are not very good at all. This will be the last time I order subs from here. The Italian was cold inside and hot on the outside. I really want there to be a good place to get subs in Mt. Holly....Papa Sammys is not it. If you're looking for a good submarine sandwich save your time and money. Although I've heard their pizza is very good. Papa Sammy, if you got no talent, don't care high schoolers making them sandwiches, fire they asses, cause they ain't makin em right.

Q_56UV7MS03EIemwDw0xcg.text: Amazingly delicious. As soon as you walk in the door you are greeted with the most flavorful aroma. We had wings, stromboli, and pizza. I have the pickiest kids and they absolutely loved the pizza. I loved my Stromboli from start to finish. Husband enjoyed his wings. Most of the tables are set up to play checkers, jenga, and other games. Very family friendly atmosphere. The owners and staff were very nice and friendly!

QJorwK1pa70AUlI18IhguQ.text: This is the most enjoyable pizza I have had in the charlotte area in some time! Not only was it super cheesy but the sauce tasted super fresh and delightful as well! We will certainly be back to try more of the menu!

photos.caption: Photo of Papa Sammy's Pizza - Mount Holly, NC, United States

EbPCHXUXTTvrWjG9kHN-nw.text: This place is great the food is always good. They are  clear and very friendly. They bring to food to your table you can play games at the tables while you wait. I go to this place a lot and I have never had a bad experience. I would highly recommend this place.

h1kUAoN99sI4ealEoJwsxQ.text: I stopped in here based on all the great things I read on Gaston Eats FB page and was super impressed with the pizza! It was very fresh and hot. Service was fast and our wait time from order placement to shoving it in our pie holes was about 12 minutes. I hear the thing to get here besides pizza is the cheese steak so I'll check that out next.

5HnjI4SGDqsxEPf3GzD9Ew.text: Papa Sammy's is the real deal. My wife and I stopped in for a late lunch. There was a family of four that came in right after us, but other than that, the place was empty.  First thing I want to comment on is the cleanliness. I don't have super-high expectations when I go into independent, hole-in-the-wall type places like this. Papa Sammy's very pleasantly subverted my expectations. Both the dining area and the part of the kitchen I could see were spotless.  First, we tried some garlic knots. They were excellent. Perfectly baked, crusty on the outside and tender on the inside, with garlic butter and parm. There was a small pool of garlic butter at the bottom of the basket, which for gluttons like myself was a great dipping option.  I got the stromboli, hold the ham and add mushrooms. My wife got the 8" pizza with pineapple and banana peppers. They came out in a very reasonable amount of time. The stromboli was great, with an excellent ratio of cheese to filling. Shortly after dropping off our food, the cashier girl dropped off a little ramekin of what turned out to be a VERY spicy habanero dipping sauce that I hadn't asked for. Turns out the other table had requested it and it got dropped off at our table by mistake. No harm, no foul; as a lover of all things spicy, I forwent the marinara and instead used that as my dipping sauce. It was fantastic and had me sweating in short order (that's a good thing).  I tried a bite of my wife's pizza and it was tasty, though pineapple and banana peppers are basically the opposite of what I like on my pizza. She enjoyed it very much, and that's what matters.  This place really impressed us. We're moving very close by very soon, and I have no doubt Papa Sammy's will make it into our regular rotation.

Dglg97SdluuAf8Gfu2Y9MQ.text: Such a sweet old man that owns the place, and a phenomenal pizza to boot! If you like thin crusts, rich cheeses, and layered flavors all for a super affordable price, go here. I'm local and been here a couple dozen times, and I still crave it when I'm out of town. This business is as home grown as it gets, and I think it's the heart and soul of pizza around here.

eY0GkLWWJ6N_FhUm-PJEeg.text: Papa Sammy's has the best cheesesteak sandwich, their homemade bread is fantastic. The staff is always friendly and the prices are good.

yCVtwbBmfSnhVq2JVgxIQw.text: Food is way to greasy and soggy.  Unclean table tops.  Young staff that don't want to work

uCU0i6AaqqJM43ensMAd2g.text: Completely average food at somewhat high prices. The people are super nice, but the pizza is just a step up from CiCi's. (Especially the "blah" crust.)  I've had pizza from pretty much every other (non chain/franchise) pizza place between Stanley and Belmont and this one brings up the rear of the pack. I really have no idea what all the rave reviews are about. There is literally nothing rave worthy about this place, except maybe the fact that someone else is cooking dinner for you

n9Q69UnZp_L_jp3xgDC_ig.text: I have been to Papa Sammy's several times but didn't feel compelled to write a review until I had their Philly chicken sandwich last night. Boy was the sandwich good. Instead of the mundane sub, they use a good Ciabatta like bread which really made it stand out in my opinion. I also loved the melted provolone cheese. Their pizzas didn't blow me away but I didn't grow up eating pizza and don't share the sentiment that pizza is a major food group so what do I know.  In short, Papa Sammy's is a mom and pop place with good quality food and good hard-working people that deserves the supports of locals.

zwXNrXTzLBenNnISLZYV3A.text: Good pizza, great prices. Sometimes a little skimpy on the amount of toppings. Overall a good mom and "Papa" restaurant. Excellent homemade deserts. Support your local businesses and eatery's!!!

NXPSMZYKBxf5aWRKZPsGww.text: I am a Detroit native so to offer a disclaimer, I have pretty high standards when it comes to pizza. To start off, I got the garlic knots, which had good flavor, but the garlic sauce seemed ... well, watered down if that is possible. As far as the pizza, it was not bad. Not too doughy and the ingredients seemed fresh. Toppings were just right. But there was nothing that really set it apart. The dining experience was unique and fast, the place was clean and in a charming small town, with the staff (well, the one guy) hustling. About as good as you are going to get for pizza in this part of the country.
